TextLibrary.Text: I know we've got important things to do, kid, but I was wondering...
I know we've got important things to do, kid, but I was wondering...
An old mining buddy of mine, Marc, moved out to Elysia a few years back. Since we're here now, I thought we might look him up. He might prove useful.
An old mining buddy of mine, Marc, moved out to Elysia a few years back. Since we're here now, I thought we might look him up. He might prove useful.
Sure, we'll check on Elysia Prime and see if we can find him.
Sure, we'll check on Elysia Prime and see if we can find him.
